name: Pas
desc: Pasla kaplanmış bir büyük yay. Sıradan birinin onu germeyi bırak yerinden bile kaldırması mümkün değil.

materials.name: Guyun'un Parlak Kumları
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The stone pillars that tower amid Guyun Stone Forest were once the stone spears Morax used to defeat his enemies. Over time, the gods' substance has seeped into the pillars that pin them down, lending them divine power. The pillars sometimes shed fragments of hatred and curses.

materials.name: Avcının Kurban Bıçağı
materials.desc: A sharp alloy weapon. Though its owner has been lost, it still reflects a disturbingly cold light.

materials.name: Kırık Maske
materials.desc:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

materials.name: Guyun'un Işıltılı Taşı
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The learned know that Guyun Stone Forest is far more than simply a miraculous sight on the sea to behold: It is the cemetery of the former gods of Liyue. Hatred and filth have periodically risen up from it, but all have been subdued by a demon-conquering young man.

materials.name: Avcının Kurban Bıçağı
materials.desc: A sharp alloy weapon. Though its owner has been lost, it still reflects a disturbingly cold light.

materials.name: Kırık Maske
materials.desc:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

materials.name: Guyun'un Işıltılı Taşı
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The learned know that Guyun Stone Forest is far more than simply a miraculous sight on the sea to behold: It is the cemetery of the former gods of Liyue. Hatred and filth have periodically risen up from it, but all have been subdued by a demon-conquering young man.

materials.name: Tefecinin Kurban Bıçağı
materials.desc: An oddly-shaped weapon made with superior Snezhnayan technology that once belonged to a senior agent. Proper training is required for using this strange weapon.

materials.name: Lekeli Maske
materials.desc:
A bone mask, covered in unidentifiable stains, that emanates a mysterious odor.
Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.

materials.name: Guyun'un Yadigarı
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The stone spear has a glimmering core formed by the power of the defeated gods. Their hatred is not directed at Morax, however, for they have lost themselves a long time ago and are incapable of holding personal grudges.

materials.name: Tefecinin Kurban Bıçağı
materials.desc: An oddly-shaped weapon made with superior Snezhnayan technology that once belonged to a senior agent. Proper training is required for using this strange weapon.

materials.name: Lekeli Maske
materials.desc:
A bone mask, covered in unidentifiable stains, that emanates a mysterious odor.
Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.

materials.name: Guyun'un Yadigarı
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The stone spear has a glimmering core formed by the power of the defeated gods. Their hatred is not directed at Morax, however, for they have lost themselves a long time ago and are incapable of holding personal grudges.

materials.name: Müfettişin Kurban Bıçağı
materials.desc: In the hands of its lord, this fierce weapon has handled many "debts." No one has eyes in the back of their heads, and this weapon and its related techniques are designed around that weakness.

materials.name: Uğursuz Maske
materials.desc:
A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.

materials.name: Guyun'un Kutsal Hazinesi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
That which lurks within and animates this relic are the divine remains of lamenting gods. They are unrealized ideals, designs for a prosperous humanity that could never be. They may now lie deep within stone and sea, but they will not go quietly into the night.

materials.name: Müfettişin Kurban Bıçağı
materials.desc: In the hands of its lord, this fierce weapon has handled many "debts." No one has eyes in the back of their heads, and this weapon and its related techniques are designed around that weakness.

A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.

value.text: Normal Saldırı Hasarını 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% artırır ama Yüklü Saldırı Hasarını 10% azaltır.

customize.name: Tartaglia
customize.desc: "Asilzade" olarak da bilinen 11 numaralı Haberci. Savaş alanındaki cesaretiyle nam salmıştır.

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc: Kendisine "Adalet Prensesi" diyen ve Oz adında bir gece kuzgunu ile seyahat eden gizemli bir kız.

customize.name: Yoimiya
customize.desc: Naganohara Havai Fişekleri'nin sahibi. "Yaz Festivali Kraliçesi" olarak bilinir, insanların umutlarını ve hayallerini simgeleyen havai fişekleri üretme konusunda ustadır.

customize.name: Amber
customize.desc: Her zaman enerjik ve hayat dolu olan Amber, Favonius Şövalyelerinin tek ve en iyi Kaşifidir.

customize.name: Aloy
customize.desc: Eskiden toplumdan dışlanmış, şimdi ise eşsiz becerilere sahip bir avcı. Her an doğru olanı yapmaya hazır.

desc.text:
Eskiden ünlü bir okçuya ait olan, dökme demir kadar sert olan kadim bit yay.
Bu okçu, canavarları ve haydutları rüzgarda savrulan gümüşotu misali öldürürmüş.
Okçuluk becerilerini kusursuzlaştırmayı hedeflerken,
kirişi acımasız gök gürültüleri gibi ses çıkarır ve
okları da güneşte ışıldayan bir demir gibi parıldarmış.
Okçu, bir ayağı çukurdayken bir aydınlanma yaşamış.
"Hitabetteki asıl hikmet söylenmeyen sözlerde, okçulardaki asıl hikmet ise atılmayan oklarda saklıdır."
Bundan sonra, gökten atılan oklardan bir daha hiç bahsetmedi.
Demir bir yaydan çıkan demir oklarla öldürülen iğrenç yaratıklardan da.
Yayını toprağa gömdü ve tepelere gidip münzevi bir hayat sürmeye başladı.
İddialara göre ölümü şöyle olmuş:
Her gece, evinden gelen kopmuş bir telin çınlayan sesi ve yayılan parlak mor ışık yüzünden, iğrenç canavarlar artık yaklaşmaya cesaret edemiyormuş.
Öldüğü gece hava fırtınalıymış. Uğultulu rüzgarların ve yağmurun ortasında gök sadece bir kere gürlemiş. Ardından gelen yıldırım gökyüzüne doğru çıkarken, galaksideki yıldızlar kadar parlakmış.
